name: The World Became Smaller & Smaller But I Needed Wood & Food
name_original: The World Became Smaller & Smaller But I Needed Wood & Food
description:
The world is getting smaller and smaller and the void is closing you in. That does not affect your daily workday to obtain both wood and food.

Collect 38 wood (reference to LD 38) and get back to your home to win. However, you are getting hungry pretty fast, so dont forget to make farms!
Also, the thing about the void closing you in, thats for real. Obtain that wood as fast as possible!

  • Made for Ludum Dare 38
  • Theme: A Small World
